verbs.description: Trump [V: has] lashed out at China , Syria and our own Constitution -- with no regard for what comes next .
[ARG0: Trump] has [V: lashed] out [ARG1: at China , Syria and our own Constitution] -- [ARGM-ADV: with no regard for what comes next] .
Trump has lashed out at China , Syria and our own Constitution -- with no regard for [ARG1: what] [V: comes] [ARGM-TMP: next] .
